metadata.Description: Assessments of the environmental impact of projects

environmental impact assessments.Description: Environmental impact assessments employ the expertise of environmental experts to evaluate the potential environmental effects of energy projects.
Environmental impact assessments collaborate with government agencies to ensure compliance with environmental regulations and standards.
Environmental impact assessments support the achievement of sustainable development goals by evaluating the environmental implications of energy projects.
Environmental impact assessments administer the process of evaluating and assessing the potential environmental impacts of energy projects.
Environmental impact assessments measure various environmental indicators to assess the potential impacts of energy projects on the environment.
Environmental impact assessments align with environmental regulations to ensure compliance and minimize the negative environmental impacts of energy projects.
Environmental impact assessments are an instance of the broader practice of environmental assessment, specifically focused on energy projects.
